name: Beat Jumpy - Music Game
description:
Follow the music and don't miss any platform!

Enjoy incredible musics to play with Beat Jumpy. Go as far as you can but be careful to not fall!

#FEATURES#

* Funny skins to unlock
* +50 songs for all tastes!
* Collect diamonds to personalise your player
* Achievements to challenge yourself

# Support

Don’t hesitate to contact our team at: support-beat-jumpy@approver-studio.com
Privacy Policy & Terms of Service: http://approver-studio.com/tos
